Title: Provides for funding of early intervention services; repealer
Summary: Provides for state funding to municipalities for early intervention services for toddlers with disabilities and their families.
LawCode: Add §2807-o, amd §§2807-s, 2557 & 2559, rpld §2543 sub 3, Pub Health L; rpld §3235-a, §3216 sub§ (i) ¶25 sub¶ (F), §3221 sub§ (l) ¶17 sub¶ (F), §4303 sub§ (ee) ¶6, Ins L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to funding early intervention services; and to repeal certain provisions of the public health law and the insurance law relating thereto
